pkgmetadata.longdescription: Machine Learning Algorithms with Unified Interface and Confusion Matrices // A unified interface is provided to various machine learning algorithms like LDA, QDA, k-nearest neighbour, LVQ, random forest, SVM, ... It allows to train, test, and apply cross-validation using similar functions and function arguments with a minimalist and clean, formula-based interface. Missing data are threated the same way as base and stats R functions for all algorithms, both in training and testing. Confusion matrices are also provided with a rich set of metrics calculated and a few specific plots.
